Salman Khan

Free Education For The World

Providing a free, world-class education for everyone

Salman Khan is the founder of the Khan Academy. Khan Academy is a non-commercial website with 13,300 educational videos in mathematics, science, computer science, history and economics. The videos are all on YouTube, while the site also provides a variety of tools for public school teachers and hands-on exercises, as well as the ability to monitor learning progress. With Khan Academy, Salman Khan aims to provide free and quality education to all people. Supporters and donors of Khan Academy include:

  • Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation
  • Google
  • Ann und John Doerr
  • Bank of America
  • Carlos Slim
  • MK-Malz
  • â€¦

Start learning now at Khan Academy
